mods.abstract: RUNAWAY. COMMITTED to the jail of the parish of Natchitoches, a man of griff color, aged about 39 years, calling himself JACOB and saying he belongs to LEONARD FLESH, of New Orleans. Was hired since two months on the stemer Hodges, bound for Red River. J. B. PLAISANCE, Jailor. May 30th, 1862.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
